__TOC__

There are three places for adding Ubuntu Studio Documentation:

* <nowiki>[[http://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuStudio]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuStudio/]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntustudio.org]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu Studio Web Site Documentation ===

Documentation hosted at <nowiki>[[http://ubuntustudio.org]]</nowiki> should be clear and concise, directed at quickly helping new users to install and use Ubuntu Studio. <<BR>>
The documentation is to be split into two parts:

* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntustudio.org/tour/| The Feature tour]]</nowiki>
* User Guide (yet not implemented)

=== Ubuntu Studio Community Wiki ===

<nowiki>[[http://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuStudio]]</nowiki> is a place for community written user documentation. Perfect for adding howtos on any Ubuntu Studio related subject.<<BR>>
Maintenance for these pages include archiving outdated pages, and making sure navigation is easy.

=== Ubuntu Studio Development Wiki ===

<nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuStudio/]]</nowiki> is also a community written wiki, but leaning towards development. Mostly developers will add or edit pages here.<<BR>>
Maintenance for this wiki is mostly about keeping pages up to date.
